WRITING.TEXT: Yeah. Snap TV already makes the game volume a bit lower altogether; the focus is what's on TV. But the crowd is still really loud, especially playing at home; whenever you make a basket the crowd goes crazy.

WRITING.TITLE: Does it bother anyone else that you can't lower the crowd volume all the way to 0?
WRITING.TEXT:
With my Xbox One, I snap TV a lot. Since Microsoft hasn't made it possible yet to mute the game, I go in settings and realized you can't completely mute the crowd. You can mute commentary, sound effects, etc.
Anyone with Xbox One feel the same way?

If you're at least a little attractive, chances are they have masturbated thinking about you.

This one actually made me chuckle. But please, no more of these.

I used to be depressed, but I got over it a year ago and he knows it. I get he wants to "rekindle" our friendship, but I don't see it going anywhere honestly. And He might think I'm fun to talk too, but I'm the polar opposite of that when it comes to him.
Rereading this, holy hell I sound like an asshole. But those are true thoughts.

WRITING.TITLE: Friend always wants to hang out but I always say I can't
WRITING.TEXT:
We're both guys, 18-19 years old.
We have been going to the same school for 7 years, this is the last.
We used to be the best of friends the first 3-4 years. Then something happened, time passed, and we're just not good at conversations together. AT ALL
Get this. He says something or brings up a topic, I have to think **really** hard to keep up the flow. I say something or bring up a topic, most of the time he replies "Oh... That's good." And that's the end of it.
I'm not the type of person who thinks silence is awkward, but with him, I just don't enjoy my time anymore.
At school, whenever he sees me, he always tries to have a conversation with me. I don't push him away or anything, in fact I'm very welcoming. He has other friends but I'm always his first choice and it's really annoying.
In the past month and a half, he's asked me 6 times to hang out. I always had legitimate excuses as to why I can't, but what do I do the day I'm free?
I left my phone downstairs for 10 minutes last week. When I came back to it, 5 missed calls. Guess who? I called him back, he wanted to hang out, I had plans unfortunately, or fortunately, however you wanna look at it.
I feel like a dick. This has been going on for about two years.
And he's not interested in me, for those who might think he's gay hahaha

WRITING.TITLE: What is the best text message you can send to a depressed person to cheer them up?
I kinda messed up an opportunity recently. How do I act around her?
WRITING.TEXT:
Long story short, near the end of last semester, I asked a girl for her number, telling her we should do something over the month long Christmas break we had.
I texted her at some point in there; it ended with us wishing each other a merry Christmas. I didn't text/call her again. I was more inclined to spending time with my guy friends or by myself over the break. I feel bad nonetheless.
This semester started last week. I ran into her once: I was in a rush so I just said hi and we parted ways. Next time, what should I do? Do I apologize? I'm not very good at this but I'm open to anything! I always had a feeling she liked me.
We're both 18-19.

I don't know why but their faces creep me the fuck out.

You're a horrible person.
I hope you get hit by a bus.

WRITING.TITLE: Has it been confirmed if we will be able to mute the game while snapping TV in a future update?
WRITING.TEXT: I play NBA 2k14 a lot and you can lower the volume of everything from the game options down to 0... except the crowd. It goes to 30. It is still really loud and noticeable while snap TV is on.
What big men do you use?

All bronze. Get 20+ assists. Run pick and roll. Run 1-3-1 zone. Points of emphasis (set them to manual so they don't change): crash off glass, crash def glass, create chaos.
That's it.
I don't care if you only score 70 points. I don't care if you lose by 50. You will get 3 stars if you get 20 assists. And if you're at least decent, you'll have 20 by the end of the 3rd already.
Good luck!

WRITING.TITLE: Against which team do you get the most MT points in Domination?
WRITING.TEXT: So I got 3 stars on everything. I wanna play with some bronze players, so I'm gonna hit up Domination. I can average 8000 points against the last all star team. What team can you consistently get more points with?
He's +1 on the 3pt and +2 on mid. He's -5 on dunk though... Didn't look at other stats. If you have the other Jordan you're good, not worth the MyTeam points.

WRITING.TITLE: I'm really horny. Link me to your favourite professionally shot porno.

WRITING.TEXT: It all depends on if the player is bronze/silver/gold and if you have sig skills on them. A bronze without any skills is 200 points for 5 contracts. A gold with 3 skills is like 1100 for 5 if I recall correctly.
I wouldn't like it. 5 hosts with a guest most of the time? Too cluttered.

If you have no contracts left, you can buy them for MyTeam points. Go in edit player, apply contracts. A thing will pop up where you can purchase 1 or 5 contracts.
There aren't any packs where you're guaranteed a contract. Sometimes you won't even get any.

Just run the pick and roll all game and get 20+ assists. I don't care if you lose by 30 points, you'll get the 3 stars if you get a good amount of assists. Play a bit of good defense as well. Make your point of emphasis crash off glass, crash def glass and create chaos (make sure they're manual, if not the game will change them). Run the 1-3-1 zone.
You should do this all while using bronze players of course.
Marketing techniques. They'll reintroduce those simple things in future installments and act like they're new features.

Any reasonable person would understand, don't be so hard on yourself.

My guy friends still invite me over to all of their hangouts, but I feel and know for a fact I'm the weakest link. It makes me feel bad, but their hangouts are always a fun time so I always go.
Also, I was in love with some girl two years ago, who thought we were just best friends. I told her, we stayed friends. Something I didn't even cause happened in the past 6 months. She never contacts me now. The rejection hurt but I got over it, and she knows I got over it. She was someone I could tell anything to and she's just not in my life anymore even though we still go to the same school. Sucks but what can I do. If I contact her she'll just think it's another attempt at "getting her."
So at the moment I don't really have any supportive people in my life, in terms of close friends. I'm alone, but I'm pretty happy. I keep a positive outlook since I'm going into university next year. It'll be a nice change of scenery and I hope I'll get to meet new people.
Rereading what I just wrote, I realize i'm such an insecure person. I project a lot of confidence in my daily life but on the inside I need attention hhahaa
Thank you!

WRITING.TITLE: Patch #4 submitted, addresses crash to main menu concerns on XB1, and other fixes

WRITING.TEXT:
What does it mean when sometimes player ratings are -1 or +2 for example? Is it because they've been playing well/badly recently?
I know when it's something like -10 or -15 it's because of an injury.
Go to the Xbox dashboard and quit the game, or just turn off the console.

Go to manage team, go to the lineup you want. Click on the player that's injured, and choose replace player.
If you don't have players other than the ones you're rocking currently, buy some packs.
